The document discusses advanced loading techniques in Panda3D, focusing on its robust asset loading system. This includes features like loading from various sources, using a virtual file system, asynchronous (threaded) loading, and managing resources efficiently. The section also covers specialized topics such as filename syntax, handling multifiles, loading resources directly from memory, and applying patches to assets.

Advanced Loading Techniques

Whereas the basics of loading models and animations has already been touched upon in the model-files and animated-models sections, Panda's asset loading system is very advanced, supporting loads from arbitrary sources, a virtual file system, and asynchronous (threaded) loading. This section describes some of the possibilities in more detail.
